title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper. Quick, creamy, and comforting.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Simple yet delicious, avocado toast is perfect for breakfast or a light snack. Top with seeds or a poached egg for extra flavor.

title: Chicken Curry
summary: A rich and flavorful chicken curry with spices, tomatoes, and coconut milk. Serve with steamed rice or naan bread.

title: Chocolate Brownies
summary: Decadent, fudgy chocolate brownies that are perfect for dessert or a sweet treat with coffee.
